title: Sensex tanks over 1,400 points on inflation worries; Tech Mahindra down 6% - Economic Times
content: Sensex tanks over 1,400 points on inflation worries; Tech Mahindra down 6%  Economic Times
description: At 2.40 pm, the BSE Sensex was trading 1,485.84 points or 2.74 per cent lower at 52,722.69. Nifty50 was trading at 15,789.65, down 450.65 points or 2.77 per cent. Midcap and smallcap indices fell around 3 per cent.
